price: 30. (Ciise) wuxuu yidhi: "Anigu waxaan ahay addoon Alle, wuxuu i siin Kitaab (Injiilka) oo uu iga yeeli Nabi;”
arabic: قَالَ إِنِّي عَبۡدُ ٱللَّهِ ءَاتَىٰنِيَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَجَعَلَنِي نَبِيّٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla innī ʿabdu al-lahi ātāniya al-kitāba wajaʿalanī nabiyyan
